channel.title: CVE Feed for wpchill -- Strong Testimonials
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpchill -- Strong Testimonials

item.title: CVE-2023-6491|2024-06-07T05:33:46.516Z -- wpchill -- strong%20testimonials
item.description: The Strong Testimonials plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to an improper capability check on the wpmtst_save_view_sticky function in all versions up to, and including, 3.1.12. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor access and above, to modify favorite views.
